resources.string: Ask the customer for OTP to start the trip

Are you sure you want to end the Trip?

Please check your internet connection and try again

Currently you are off duty, Please turn on you duty in order to get new rides at your location.

Please Confirm this bill to the customer.

Something bad has happened with the API

Are you sure you want to log out ?

resources.string: Switch to text input mode for the time input.

Please follow the instruction below to complete your MTN transaction

1. Dial *170#

2. Choose option: 7) Wallet

3. Choose option: 3) My Approvals

4. Enter your MOMO pin to retrieve your pending approval list

5. Choose a pending transaction

6. Choose option 1 to approve

7. Wait while we verify your payment

2. Approve the transaction with your PIN.

Please follow the instruction below to get your voucher code

1. Dial *110# to generate your transaction voucher.

2. Select OPTION 4 "Make Payments".

3. Select OPTION 4 to generate the voucher.

4. Enter your PIN in the next prompt.

5. Input the voucher generated in the voucher field below.
